mainText:
Steve Jobs was a great man, not only for his ability to SELL great products,
but for his ability to CREATE them. Not just imagine them, but to bring them
to real life. What was truly great about what he did was not on the
presentation stage, but in the board room and in the labs and in the
offices. He had a vision for how a world class organization is run, for what
a world class organization DOES, and he had an uncanny ability to get
everyone to buy into it and achieve that goal. In this way, he was not only
a business leader but an icon for modern humanity: we will need more people
like him in our future. He will be sorely missed.
author: Ashish
